Title: exponentialTimeDecayedSum
Description: Returns the sum of exponentially smoothed moving average values of a time series at the index t in time.
v — Value. Integer, Float or Decimal.t — Time. Integer, Float or Decimal, DateTime, DateTime64.
x — Half-life period. Integer, Float or Decimal.
Returns the sum of exponentially smoothed moving average values at the given point in time. Float64.
Examples: SELECT    value,    time,    round(exp_smooth, 3),    bar(exp_smooth, 0, 10, 50) AS barFROM    (    SELECT    (number = 0) OR (number >= 25) AS value,    number AS time,    exponentialTimeDecayedSum(10)(value, time) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS exp_smooth    FROM numbers(50)    );
